GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article with the given article id

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for an article with the given id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment for the article with the given article_id, serves the posted comment

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment with the given id
